Articles.Content:
Anyone want to help me make a add-on? 

I need someone to help make this decoupler the same size as the top of the stock parachute to put on top.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/y7pr9grl4gfrvok/Decoupler.rar](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y7pr9grl4gfrvok/Decoupler.rar)

(I used Maya, you can use whatever)

> 
> The mod is a extra drogue parachute that goes on the main stock parachute

The NovaPunch pack has a decoupler for attaching to the top of command pod where the chute goes.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
